title: CaptionExchange Platform
description: Real-time broadcast captioning system handling live caption delivery for major TV networks.
longDescription: Multi-tenant platform enabling real-time caption exchange between broadcasters, supporting WebSocket-based communication and multiple transcription providers.

title: SLO Monitoring Platform
description: Service Level Objective monitoring and alerting platform for financial trading systems.
longDescription: Built end-to-end SLO platform with custom metrics collection, anomaly detection, and intelligent alerting for high-frequency trading systems.

title: Real-Time Bidding Platform
description: High-throughput ad-tech platform processing billions of bid requests daily.
longDescription: Designed and built real-time bidding infrastructure capable of handling millions of QPS with sub-10ms response times.

title: Location-Based Game Backend
description: Scalable backend infrastructure for location-based mobile games with millions of DAU.
longDescription: Built geospatial data processing pipelines and real-time game state synchronization systems for location-based gaming platforms.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Modern portfolio website built with Next.js, featuring dark mode and smooth animations.
longDescription: Production-grade portfolio showcasing modern web development practices with CI/CD, Docker, and comprehensive testing.
